title: Hour 1: The Great Cookie Debate
description:
Suns and Warriors trash talk, Mac Jones losing his job because of a wire, and Dan gets fooled by the internet regarding Tennessee Football. Then, what's an adult cookie and what's a kid cookie? Are animal crackers cookies or crackers? Then, Stugotz is still furious with Mike Evans and his referee friends, and Dan is obsessed with the horrendous Iowa offense and Kirk Ferentz's defense of his son.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
